copy.title: Copy
copy.description: (Recommended) Audiobooks will be copied to the library, leaving the original files untouched. This method uses the most storage space, but you can safely delete the originals afterward.

move.title: Move
move.description: Audiobooks will be moved to the library, and the original files will be deleted.

link.title: Link
link.description: Audiolyn will link to the original files without copying them. This is the fastest method, but deleting the original files will make the audiobooks inaccessible in Audiolyn.
